text: Anything Goes is a 1936 American musical movie directed by Lewis Milestone and was based on the 1934 musical of the same name by Guy Bolton and P. G. Wodehouse. It stars Bing Crosby, Ida Lupino, Charles Ruggles, Ethel Merman, Grace Bradley, Arthur Treacher, Robert McWade, Richard Carle, Margaret Dumont, Edward Gargan and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1936 musical movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:Movies based on musicals Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Anything Goes (1936 movie)
